p: Droplets with a 20 μm diameter were prepared by injecting the photo-responsive cholesteric liquid crystals in a mixture of water and D 2O enriched in tetradecyl-trimethylammonium bromide surfactant. The size dispersity of the droplets is shown in Supplementary Fig. 1. D 2O was used to match the density of the liquid crystal and thus prevent the droplets from floating or sinking.
